articles.title: Police have person of interest in custody over Brown University deadly shooting
articles.description:
The shooting erupted Saturday afternoon in the engineering building of the Ivy League school in Providence, Rhode Island, during final exams.

The post Police have person of interest in custody over Brown University deadly shooting appeared first on Boston.com.
